"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54963b7c6368723031270300#post_54963b7c6368723031270300
That's why the fourth one is probably the best. The focus is still majority on Mark whalberg but there is more focus on the transformers and whalberg is a _waaaaay_ more interesting protagonist. 

It probably could have done with about an hour cut off of it though.
